QuestData.Title: The Captive King
QuestData.Description:
King Anduin has not been found inside Torghast. I fear we could spend eternity searching those endless corridors to no avail.
We must know what fate has befallen him. To peer into the tower represents a grave risk, yet we have little choice.
Stand with me, $n. We will use the broken Helm of Domination to see into that hellish place.
Perhaps together we can hold back the hungry darkness.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Helm of Domination to peer into Torghast.
QuestData.RewardText:
Anduin may appear unharmed, but his soul is imperiled.
Sylvanas Windrunner cannot be allowed to carry out her plan.

Objectives.Objective: Use the Helm of Domination to peer into Torghast
